item.title: [508] Rune Rifts [508]
item.dc:creator: @Pkman411 Pkman411
item.description:
@Pkman411 wrote:

Hello… i was adding the rune rifts to use as the teleport locations to the alters in my 508 server… i added them to the frames.java in the io folder by the createglobalobject section… i’m most certainly not new to coding so i should be able to figure out even the worst description… i had the feeling that it may be the item type… i know that walls are one thing, items are another, and there are other’s but i’m not sure if it’s that or the height(wich i currently have set at zero… these are the codes:

createGlobalObject(p, 7131, 0, 3053, 3494, 0, 10); createGlobalObject(p, 7130, 0, 3053, 3495, 0, 10); createGlobalObject(p, 7132, 0, 3053, 3496, 0, 10); createGlobalObject(p, 7133, 0, 3053, 3497, 0, 10); createGlobalObject(p, 7136, 0, 3053, 3498, 0, 10); createGlobalObject(p, 7137, 0, 3050, 3494, 0, 10); createGlobalObject(p, 7129, 0, 3050, 3495, 0, 10); createGlobalObject(p, 7134, 0, 3050, 3496, 0, 10); createGlobalObject(p, 7135, 0, 3050, 3497, 0, 10);

Oh and if you happen to have the coordinates to the soul, mind, or air alters, it would be greatly appreciated

Read full topic
